attributes.action: Hold a general election as confidence in the current government is very low
attributes.additional_details: The current government are making decisions that go against the values of nearly all residents of Britain. The votes they are casting are causing untold misery to millions of people. We deserve to have a competent and compassionate government on charge. This current one is none of these.
attributes.background: The government need to call am immediate general election to allow the public to decide who should really be looking after us all during these times of pandemic and hardship. An election as a must to ensure the right party is leading is to better times.
